public class King
extends ChessPiece

Class that imitates the behavior of the King chess piece

Constructor Detail

King

public King(String player,
            ChessGame game,
            ChessLocation initialLocation)
Constructor sets the owner, current game, the inital locaiton and the character ID of the King

Parameters:
player - A String that corresponds the the owner of the King
game - The ChessGame that the King is a part of
initialLocation - A ChessLocation where the piece is to be placed at the begining of the game
Method Detail

moveTo

public void moveTo(ChessLocation newLocation)
The King can move in any direction but only one square at a time Method checks if the move is legal and if it is, moves the King on the board

Overrides:
moveTo in class ChessPiece
Parameters:
newLocation - The proposed location where the King is to be moved to
